android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatTextV.android:text: > list station
You can check all extensions in respeactive ACD with the help of above command.
> display station 550955
you can check all the extension / station parameters with the help of above command.
> change station 550955
If you want to change any parameter like Extension name,password,Tenant,cor etc do it using this command.
> add station
If you want to create new extension then do it with the help of this command.
> status station 550955
This command will help you to check that extensions which are in service or out off service
> list registered-ip-stations ext 550955 count 10
It will show the regisered extensions and IPs.
you can check free extensions in respective ACD with the help of this command.
It is possible to check how many phones are registered in any network region with the help of above command.
> busy-out station 550955
If the extension is out off service or any agent wants to log out from extension then execute this command.
> release station 550955
Once done above step then relase station, phone will restart automatically once phone up then ask agent to use same phone.
> list cor
After executing above command you are able to see all cors in respacive ACD.
> change cor 9
As per respeactive ACD find free cor and copy that cor number then execute above command with cor number.
Then set the cor name also enable the cor permissions as per ACD setup.
> display cor 9
You can check all the parameters of COR using this command.
> change tenant 12
You can able to change tenant name, tenant permission using this command.
> display tenant 12
Using above command you can able to see all the parameters and tenanat name.
> list hunt-group
It is possible to find all hunt groups in respactive ACD with the help of this command.
> display hunt-group 12
You can check that perticular hunt groups all parameters and name.
> change hunt-group 12
You can create new hunt-group also do the changes in exsiting hunt group using above command.
> list usage hunt-group 12
You can able to find agnet IDs,Vector,VDN which are mapped to this pertivulare hunt group by using above command.
> list usage vector 143
You can able to find VDN numbers which are mapped to this perticulare vector.
> display vector 143
> change vector 143
If you want to create any vector do it with the help of above command as per client call flow.
> list vector
By using above command you are able to check all the vector in respactive ACD.
> list announcements 111127
You can check all the announcements and their names in respactive ACD with the help of above command.
> add announcement next
If you want to create new Announcement in ACD then execute above command and fill required details.
> display announcement 111127
Execute above command and check the Announcement details like name, board, tenant,cor etc.
> display audio-group 5
After executing above command. If there is a group like G5 or any name then execute below command to check which VAL board is added in that audio group.
> list integrated-Ann-board 03a03
It shows that how much space is free in that perticular VAL board aslo it shows announcement names and numbers.
> list ipserver-interface all
It will show the IPSI cards status linek IN service or out off-service also board,IP address PN etc.
> ping ipservicerinterface 3a
If IPSI card is in hang state or out-off service then execute above command and check the result.
If the ping result is not happing then share that result and IPSI IP with network team for further assistance.
> busy ipservicerinterface 3a
This is soft reset of IPSI cards commands.Once execute above command immediatly execute below command.
> busy ipservicer-interface 3a
Once execute above command then check IPSP is in-service or not.
> display ip-network-map
This command will help you to check IP range, voice VLAN,network region etc.
> change ip-network-map
you can assign IPs to devices / phones with the help of above command.
> list ip-network-map all
It will show the whole IP range,voice vlans,network regions etc in your respactive ACDs.
> list ip-network-region monitor
It will show the network region, Name,Port No IPv4,codec set,UDP min port,
> enable nr-registration 9
If you have disabled any network region then you can enable it using above command.
> display ars analysis location all 5
You can see the decalred dialed string, min,max number range,route pattern then do it with the help of this command.
> change ars analysis location all 5
If you want to change/create new dialed string, min,max number range,route pattern then do it with the help of this command.
> list route-pattern
First check all route pattern in your respactive ACD with the help of above command.
> display route-pattern 12
If you want to use route pattern 12, then check which trunk is added in that route pattern using above command.
> change route-pattern 12
After executing above command assign route pattern name,add trunk number also set FRL as per ACD setup.
> list trunk-group
Once you execute above command then see the all trunk number and name which are already created in ACD
> display trunk-group 929
It will show the all parameters of that trunk like trunk name, signaling group etc.
> change trunk-group 929
You are able to do all change on trunk by using this command.
> add trunk-group 929
If you want to create new trunk then do it by using this command.
> list signaling-group
All voice engineers are able to see all signaling group in ACD using this command.
> display signaling-group 929
You can see the all parameters which are already available in that signaling group in respactive ACD by using this command.
> change signaling-group 929
You can change the signaling group also add near end node name and far end node name as well as thir IDs in respactive ACD by using this command.
> list node-names all
It will show the all node names in respactive ACD.
> display node-names Pune_Bang_SY
Once execute above command it will show the IP address of that node names in respactive ACD.
> change node-names Pune_Bang_SY
You can able to change IP address as well as node names in respactive ACD.
> list configuration carrier a
By using above command check how many cards are inserted in perticulare port network.
> list survivable-processor
> status cabinet 1
It used to check cabinate status.Once execute above command it will show Activate and standby status.
> status cdr-link
You can check CDR-LINK status with the help of above command.
> status aesvcs interface
You can check CDR-LINK status with the help of above command.
> go shell
If you want to ping or trace any device IP from ACD then login into ACD and execute this command and hit enter.
> traceroute 10.134.132.99
This command will help you to check any device IP is reachebale from ACD or not.
> sat
Now execute above command to go back to ACD.
> display cabinet 1
It will show the all information about all cards which are inserted in that cabinate/port network.
> status cabinet 1
It will show the status of cabinate/port network.
> list ip-interface medpro
It will show all all medpro cards status,IP and port network number.
> status media-processor board 02A03
This command will help you to check card status like up or down,MAC address,Network Region and Alarms.
> list media-gateway
This command will help you to check all media gateways which are registred in respactive ACD.
> list media-server
This command will help you to check all media servers which are registred in respactive ACD.
> list ip-codec-set
If you want to check all codec set which are created in respective ACD then do it using this command.
> change ip-codec-set 2
This command will help you to change any code set in respactive ACD.
> display ip-codec-set 2
This command will help you to check any code set parameters and permissions in respactive ACD.
> list bcms skill 434
If you want check how many agent are logged in on any skill do it using above command in respactive ACD.
> status health
This is used to check alarms in respactive ACD.
> status aesvcs cti-link
This is help to check that CTI links are established or not in respactive ACD.
